title: Nisyu
description: Nisyu is an e-commerce platform for makeup products. It features product listings, a shopping cart, and secure transactions. Developed as a college project.
achievements: It was my first project. And it was the project from where I understood web development deeply.

title: GYCare
description: GYCare is a user-friendly ambulance booking app prototye. It allows users to quickly request an ambulance in emergencies, track its real-time arrival, and make secure payments.
